title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4203.4 - Race meeting official
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4203.4 - Race meeting official

State Regulations

No member of the staff of the commission shall at any
time or place, either in the State of New York or elsewhere, act as an official
at any race meeting, whether for compensation in any form or otherwise, without
the formal consent of the commission, in writing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4203.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
